@1@ Gets a {{tt|span}} referencing the written area if {{lc|std::ios_base::out}} is set in the open mode, or a {{tt|span}} referencing the underlying buffer otherwise.

@2@ Makes the {{tt|basic_spanbuf}} perform I/O on the buffer referenced by {{tt|s}}. Sets pointers to get area, put area, or both.

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|std::span&lt;CharT&gt;(pbase(), pptr())}} if {{lc|std::ios_base::out}} is set in the open mode, or a {{c|std::span&lt;CharT&gt;}} that references the whole underlying buffer otherwise.

@2@ (none)
